name: LogFlume
summary: Super Light Logging System in Swift
description: LogFlume is a lightweight, scalable, useful, and fast logging library for Swift. With LogFlume, developers can easily add logging functionality to their Swift applications without sacrificing performance. LogFlume is designed to be highly scalable, allowing developers to configure the logging level and output destination according to their needs. Additionally, LogFlume provides a simple and intuitive API that makes it easy for developers to use the library and customize their logging output. Despite its lightweight design, LogFlume is a highly useful logging library that can be used in a wide range of Swift applications. Whether you're building a small utility or a large-scale application, LogFlume is a powerful tool that can help you debug and troubleshoot your code with ease.
